views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8 to 12.4

FastDeleteKey Gives the Opportunity to Custom Change the Fast Deletion Speed on the System Wide Keyboards to your Characters and in Addition to Disable the Auto Deletion!

The Tweak (Dubbed FlashEraser) is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository with also the Addition of the Preferences Panel and Custom Options.

Configure options from Settings.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak and its options.

See Screenshot below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.2
- Added Support Compatibility till iOS 12.4 and arm64e/A12 Devices.
